memberdef.name: EXPECT_SCALAR_EQ
memberdef.initializer: do { \ ASSERT_THAT(result, IsOk()); \ auto scalar = result.value(); \ ASSERT_TRUE(std::holds_alternative<expected_type>(scalar)); \ EXPECT_EQ(std::get<expected_type>(scalar), expected_value); \ } while (0)

memberdef.name: EXPECT_DECIMAL_EQ
memberdef.initializer: do { \ ASSERT_THAT(result, IsOk()); \ auto scalar = result.value(); \ ASSERT_TRUE(std::holds_alternative<Decimal>(scalar)); \ auto decimal = std::get<Decimal>(scalar); \ EXPECT_EQ(decimal.ToString(scale), expected_value); \ } while (0)

memberdef.name: EXPECT_SCALAR_NULL
memberdef.initializer: do { \ ASSERT_THAT(result, IsOk()); \ auto scalar = result.value(); \ ASSERT_TRUE(std::holds_alternative<std::monostate>(scalar)); \ } while (0)
